mapper.insert: insert into exercise_record (id, patient_id, device_id, arthro, postion, direction, geolocation, start_time, end_time, start_angle, end_angle, sr, create_time,record_data) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{arthro,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{geolocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startAngle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endAngle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recordData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update exercise_record set patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, arthro = #{arthro,jdbcType=INTEGER}, postion = #{postion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, direction = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, geolocation = #{geolocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_angle = #{startAngle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_angle = #{endAngle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sr = #{sr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, record_data = #{recordData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, patient_id, device_id, arthro, postion, direction, geolocation, start_time, end_time, start_angle, end_angle, sr, create_time from exercise_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, patient_id, device_id, arthro, postion, direction, geolocation, start_time, end_time, start_angle, end_angle, sr, create_time from exercise_record
select id, patient_id, device_id, arthro, postion, direction, geolocation, start_time, end_time, start_angle, end_angle, sr, create_time from exercise_record WHERE patient_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, patient_id, device_id, arthro, postion, direction, geolocation, start_time, end_time, start_angle, end_angle, sr, create_time,record_data from exercise_record WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY create_time desc LIMIT 1
